name: CapeMan in Nightmare Realm
description:
CapeMan in Nightmare Realm

A one button game created for the Syntax Bomb "There Can Be Only ONE" competition - Oct '21.

Story

Dave was jogging thru the mountains and he found a magic cape, just in time as he was sucked into the Nightmare Realm!

Controls

One Button to Rule them All

Space (default) - Jump and Fly (with Cape), hold to attack (with Cape)

Play Key to Jump. When you have the Cape, double Hit the Play Key to Fly.

Whilst flying, hold down the Play Key to start an Attack.

In Attack mode you will glow and enemies can be killed, if you land you will stop attacking.

Attack mode is time limited.

Fly Energy is also limited.
